title: Full Stack Web Developer
summary: Contributed to the development of a custom e-learning platform enabling full content and learning flow management.
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of a custom e-learning platform enabling full content and learning flow management.
Implemented multi-tenant user access with role-based dashboards and permissions for Admin/Professor/Student, including dedicated dashboard experiences per role.
Built a complete Quiz Engine with multiple interactive formats and automatic CEFR result classification (A1, A2, B1, B2...).
Developed lesson management workflows including course structure, lesson content, and scheduled lesson instances (sessions planning and tracking).
Created a document library system with folder-based organization to manage learning resources and internal documents.
Implemented notifications with real-time in-app updates using WebSockets and email sending using reusable templates.
Delivered dashboard analytics and statistics for admins to track engagement, progress, and performance.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
summary: Designed and developed a scalable job marketplace platform inspired by Glassdoor, featuring company profiles, job postings, and employee review.
responsibilities: Designed and developed a scalable job marketplace platform inspired by Glassdoor, featuring company profiles, job postings, and employee review.
Built a robust candidature management system enabling recruiters to post job opportunities, track applications, and manage candidate interactions efficiently.
Created custom user dashboards for employers and candidates, enhancing platform usability.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
summary: Spearheaded the design and development of a healthcare specialist matching application, enabling users to find and connect with the most suitable healthcare providers based on their needs.
responsibilities: Spearheaded the design and development of a healthcare specialist matching application, enabling users to find and connect with the most suitable healthcare providers based on their needs.
Led the end-to-end development of the platform, including the creation of admin and doctor dashboards, streamlining user management and improving operational efficiency.
Designed and implemented a dynamic questionnaire system integrated with a quota calculation engine, ensuring accurate matching of users with specialized healthcare professionals.
Enhanced user experience by integrating a filtering solution with an interactive map view using LeafletJS, allowing users to easily locate specialists and access critical information.

title: Angular Developer
summary: Contributed to the front-end development of platform for comparing medical insurance.
responsibilities: Contributed to the front-end development of platform for comparing medical insurance.
Re-styled and re-designed the user interfaces to enhance usability and aesthetics, ensuring a modern and visually appealing experience.
Re-factored existing code to improve performance, maintainability, and scalability.

title: Full Stack Software Engineer
summary: Contributed to the development of a CRM project.
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of a CRM project.
Implemented a dynamic drag-and-drop system, improving the visual representation and user interaction within the project.
Introduced a galleries library system, linked to various stages and statuses of the CRM project, enhancing overall functionality.
Architected resumes storage library, implementing a specified filtering mechanism using Ag-grid.

title: End of Study Internship
summary: Designed and deployed a marketplace for trading pre-owned Apple products, empowering users to list their items.
responsibilities: Designed and deployed a marketplace for trading pre-owned Apple products, empowering users to list their items.
Established intuitive user profiles, an efficient admin panel, and a product details.
Implemented shopping cart functionality, streamlining the purchasing process for sellers.
Helped in the implementation of CI/CD pipelines on Azure.
